title: Strawberry pavlova with vanilla cream and a strawberry glaze
description: This isn’t just any strawberry pavolva, this one is topped with a sticky strawberry glaze and drizzled with caramel for a fancy finish.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 10z fresh strawberries, half cut into halves and the remainder left whole with leaves left on
2 sheets gelatine, soaked in a small bowl of water
